lyrics.stanza: We turn our hearts to You, Lord. Make us all so true, Blend our hearts together, make all things new. As we turn away From this earthly dross, What was gain before we now count as loss.
Every day we find You living In our spirit—the full supply; How we're blessed that You are giving all You are to us in life.
As we set our mind On You, living One, In our spirit, Lord, we find we are one. What was once our case Seem to slip away As we fellowship with You, we long to stay.
I would linger here In Your presence, Lord; How we find our hearts loving You more. As we guard our hearts, Keep them unto Thee, Preserve us, Lord, for all eternity.
